amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds by the Bureau of Reclamation to terminate, or implement, administer, or enforce the termination of, the existing Sacramento River Settlement Contracts before the resolution of Natural Resources Defense council, et al v. Jewell, et al.

action.text: Ms. Kaptur raised a point of order against the LaMalfa amendment (A055). Ms. Kaptur stated that the provisions of the amendment seek to change existing law and constitute legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A055) offered by Mr. LaMalfa.
